column5: This sets up so easy can't wait to use it. Will be sweet.   This should keep us warm.   Found a 5lb tank after calling about 10 places and found it at the 1st place I called who said they didn't have any.   This also arrived in the mail. It was a free rebate when we bought the Minnkota Powerdrive V2
NICE! You're set for the rest of ice season!
Hey !!! its not Christmas yet !! Santas gonna be pissed !!
Mom was a little pissed! Haha! But we did get all that stuff for the price of a comparable "CLAM"
Cool stuff, that hut and heater look awesome. Wonder what santa will put under my tree this year
How do you steer that hut with the co pilot?  :blahblah1:  :clapping:  Rob C
I got the same hut and heater, your going to love it.
I think you are going to need an inline filter between the tank and the heater. I may be wrong but you may want to check that out,you can probably get it from princess auto.
good stuff ! the hut looks pimp... my 2 man clam still does that job but is getting old... I also have the same buddy as you... amazing little unit
Yep, can't wait to get out!  As for the buddy heater. I won't need a filter because we bought the 10ft buddy hose.
